author: leosimons
msg: * xdok: thoroughly clean up and refactor. Implement skip-if-not-modified as an option.
* test/00-basic-run.sh, test/01-menu-support.sh: add --force to disable skip-if-not-modified during testing.

author: gozer
msg: It used to be possibly to list optionnal features
that a module required, as in:
use mod_perl qw(1.23 MethodHandlers Authen Authz);
Apache2::AuthCookie is an example user of this
feature. It might be worthwile to re-introduce
